00024 #ifndef COIN_SOBOOLOPERATION_H
00025 #define COIN_SOBOOLOPERATION_H
00026 
00027 #include <Inventor/engines/SoSubEngine.h>
00028 #include <Inventor/engines/SoEngineOutput.h>
00029 #include <Inventor/fields/SoMFBool.h>
00030 #include <Inventor/fields/SoMFEnum.h>
00031 
00032 
00033 class COIN_DLL_API SoBoolOperation : public SoEngine {
00034   typedef SoEngine inherited;
00035 
00036   SO_ENGINE_HEADER(SoBoolOperation);
00037 
00038 public:
00039   enum Operation {
00040     CLEAR, SET,
00041     A, NOT_A,
00042     B, NOT_B,
00043     A_OR_B, NOT_A_OR_B, A_OR_NOT_B, NOT_A_OR_NOT_B,
00044     A_AND_B, NOT_A_AND_B, A_AND_NOT_B, NOT_A_AND_NOT_B,
00045     A_EQUALS_B, A_NOT_EQUALS_B
00046   };
00047 
00048   SoMFBool a;
00049   SoMFBool b;
00050   SoMFEnum operation;
00051 
00052   SoEngineOutput output;  //SoMFBool
00053   SoEngineOutput inverse; //SoMFBool
00054 
00055   SoBoolOperation();
00056 
00057   static void initClass();
00058 
00059 protected:
00060   ~SoBoolOperation();
00061 
00062 private:
00063   virtual void evaluate();
00064 };
00065 
00066 #endif // !COIN_SOBOOLOPERATION_H
